seo_content:
Exclusive The 5%ers Trading Offer

The 5%ers, based in Israel, was established in April 2016. The firm is a CFD provider offering Instant, 2 Steps, and Bootcamp program types. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $250,000. Platforms supported include MT5 and TradeLocker. Tradable instruments include Forex, Commodities and Indices, with leverage options up to 1:100 for majors, exotics, and cryptocurrencies. The 5%ers has a 4.8/5 review score based on 21,250 reviews. authenticated by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
